definition: commune

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
society/group/club/agency/(old) god of the land
people's commune
Paris Commune 1871, an unsuccessful proletarian uprising against the French Third Republic
collectivization of agriculture (disastrous policy of communist Russia around 1930 and China in the 1950s)

sentences.english: That is, if you are one of these commune communities, then you're just a small number of people.
sentences.chinese: 即使是公社，集結成的也只是個小衆團體。

sentences.english: It is one of complete commune educated youth .
sentences.chinese: 是全公社知青中的第一對。

sentences.english: It is quite a waste for a poor commune like Dong Xuan.
sentences.chinese: 這對像東川這樣的窮公社來說，是種浪費。

sentences.english: During the Great Leap Forward in 1958, people rushed headlong into mass action to establish people's communes.
sentences.chinese: 一九五八年“大躍進”，一哄而起搞人民公社化。

sentences.english: The year 1871 witnessed the heroic uprising of the Paris Commune.
sentences.chinese: 1871年爆發了英勇的巴黎公社起義。

sentences.english: Then those Communards who had so far escaped were herded together and given mock trials.
sentences.chinese: 倖存下來的公社社員們被集體模擬審判。

sentences.english: The working class did not expect miracles from the Commune.
sentences.chinese: 工人階級並沒有期望公社做出奇蹟。

sentences.english: The rural communes were highly regimented .
I'd like to make a collect phone call.
sentences.chinese: 西盟公社我想撥對方付費電話。

sentences.english: The early rice output in that commune was 200% more than that of 2001.
sentences.chinese: 那個公社的早稻產量是2001年的兩倍。

sentences.english: We've laid away some electric motors for this people's commune.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經爲這個人民公社保留起幾臺電動機了。

sentences.english: Imagine the headquarters of Lehman Brothers converted into a commune.
sentences.chinese: 可以想想雷曼兄弟公司的頭腦們住進公社是什麼樣子。

sentences.english: Yangshao culture is matriarchal clan commune system during the cultural prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 仰韶文化屬於母系氏族公社制繁榮時期的文化。

sentences.english: "The Paris Commune, " said Lenin, "was the first step.
sentences.chinese: “巴黎公社，”列寧說，“邁出了第一步。”

sentences.english: The principles of the Paris Commune are eternal.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎公社的原則是永存的。

sentences.english: The other is the forming of the city people's com-munes.
sentences.chinese: 另一項是組織了城市人民公社。

grain supply station
fixing of farm output quotas for each household
village chief/mayor (of village or township)
office/headquarters

definition: (category defined by the Communist Party) poor and lower-middle peasants: farmers who, before land reform, possessed little or no land (poor peasants) and those who were barely able to support themselves with their own land (lower-middle peasants)
CCP county committee
